posts.post_content: Cantrips are wonderful, but this one is a little overcosted off of a card ([Dark Banishing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Banishing)) that has become generally obsolete due to the printings of [Go For the Throat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Go For the Throat), [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade), and [Rend Flesh](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rend Flesh), among others. Still, a cool name for a card that certainly fits black's flavor.
posts.html:
